titles.title: Let The Holy Ghost Take Control Of You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the Holy Ghost take control of you.
Let the Holy Ghost take control of you.
He will lead you; He will guide you
In the way of the Lord.
Let the Holy Ghost take control of you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He will heal your body;
He will make you whole.
He will save your spirit,
And sanctify your soul.
Make you a new creature forever more.
Let the Holy Ghost take control of you.
